issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.2 (foreground color: #000000, background color: #1f6952, font size: 10.0pt (13.3333px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.2 (foreground color: #000000, background color: #1f6952, font size: 10.0pt (13.3333px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.81 (foreground color: #000000, background color: #555555, font size: 10.0pt (13.3333px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.2:1. Recommendation:  change background to #37816a.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.2:1. Recommendation:  change background to #37816a.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > section > aside > div:nth-child(2) > button:nth-child(2)

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.82:1. Recommendation:  change background to #757575.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.82:1. Recommendation:  change background to #757575.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > section > aside > div:nth-child(2) > button:nth-child(4)

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

node.explanation:

issues.title: Aside should not be contained in another landmark
issues.description: Ensure the complementary landmark or aside is at top level

any.message: The null landmark is contained in another landmark.

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The null landmark is contained in another landmark.

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (76.5px by 18px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 19px instead of at least 24px.
